ingredients: 1/2 Baguette or other stale bread, small pieces
steps: In 8 ” square pan, place bread scraps and sprinkle butter over top
In a large mixing bowl, whisk milk, sugar, eggs, cinnamon, and vanilla until well combined
Pour in the mixture and use a fork to make sure the bread is submerged
Bake until golden brown and the top springs back, about 45 min
title: Bread Pudding
